title: Build Fails at "undefined reference to `XDefaultScreen'" (and Friends)

milestone.title: OBS Studio 31.0
milestone.description:
Items that we would like to consider for inclusion (or removal) in OBS Studio 31.0.

NOTE: Items on this list are not promised to be in the listed release, just that we are considering them. This list is subject to change at any time.

### Expected Behavior

Build is >= successful.

### Steps to Reproduce

1. Build FFmpeg without linking to 'libX11'.
2. Build OBS Studio.

Something like this will allow for FFmpeg to be built without X11 support, but I'm not sure if it would be desirable:

```
--- libobs/cmake/os-linux.cmake
+++ libobs/cmake/os-linux.cmake
@@ -47,6 +47,7 @@
 target_link_libraries(
   libobs
   PRIVATE
+    X11::X11
     X11::x11-xcb
     xcb::xcb
     LibUUID::LibUUID
```

See also: https://bugs.gentoo.org/946057

Thank you!
